text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering | 92% | stars now 812 → est 4254 (range 4229-4279)
   https://github.com/muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering
2) journey-ad/gemini-watermark-remover | 92% | stars now 968 → est 3346 (range 3321-3371)
   https://github.com/journey-ad/gemini-watermark-remover
3) productdevbook/port-killer | 91% | stars now 2429 → est 5570 (range 5542-5598)
   https://github.com/productdevbook/port-killer
4) Maxteabag/sqlit | 89% | stars now 1396 → est 2659 (range 2634-2684)
   https://github.com/Maxteabag/sqlit
5) QwenLM/Qwen-Image-Layered | 88% | stars now 799 → est 2292 (range 2267-2317)
   https://github.com/QwenLM/Qwen-Image-Layered

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
